alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 28 at 1:13PM CST until February 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Red flag warning for parts of western and west-central Oklahoma, and parts of western north Texas Tuesday afternoon... .Dry conditions and gusty winds will contribute to favorable fire conditions during the afternoon and evening on Tuesday. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 6 PM CST this evening. * TIMING...Noon to 600 PM. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 7 percent. * TEMPERATURES...69 to 79 degrees. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
